tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ridership_data (
  rider_id INT,
  route_id INT,
  date DATE,
  boarding_time TIME,
  alighting_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE trips (
  trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  rider_id INT,
  start_location VARCHAR(100),
  end_location VARCHAR(100),
  trip_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (rider_id) REFERENCES riders(rider_id)
);

CREATE TABLE riders (
    rider_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    rider_name VARCHAR(50),
    rider_age INT,
    rider_location VARCHAR(100),
    ride_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE rides (
    ride_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    rider_id INT REFERENCES riders(rider_id),
    ride_date DATE,
    ride_distance FLOAT,
    ride_duration TIME
);

CREATE TABLE routes (
    route_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_location VARCHAR(100),
    end_location VARCHAR(100),
    route_distance FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE riders (rider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
            rider_name VARCHAR(255),
            rider_location VARCHAR(255),
            ride_count INT);

CREATE TABLE routes (route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
            route_name VARCHAR(255),
            start_location VARCHAR(255),
            end_location VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE schedules (schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
              route_id INT,
              departure_time TIMESTAMP,
              arrival_time TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
              vehicle_name VARCHAR(255),
              vehicle_type VARCHAR(255),
              capacity INT);
